posts.postText: Hey guys, a player named Freelance has informed me of a glitch that has occurred for him. Pretty much he has been shortchanged ammo for all of his bought guns, for example he has only recieved 2 rockets, 45 SMG ammo and a couple Crossbow shots. He is a solid player and he is on flood a lot so I would hate to see him have to leave the server because of a glitch like this,
I'm pretty sure he already informed Bird of this, and he is working on it.

>> Bob Dole":h2mz0vhr]
Working on it, strange glitch.
 
tell Non-Toxic about it.
